name: Kill Pill (SteelZK)
description:
This is kill pill. It's me and my teams first attempt at a game jam. You are a man  that relives the same day over and over again. The only way to stop the loop is to get to the end. Problem is... there are enemy pills in the way. Kill the pills, get to the end.

Most programming was done by me  

Some programming & ALL 3D art was done by Demon   https://sendoricon.itch.io/

All 2D art / UI was done by Jerico, aka OwllCraft  https://twitter.com/owllcraftart
